page.title: 10 An Ordinary Day
page.content: I get up at 7.30am for school which is at 9.00am.I have some cereal for my breakfast. When I arrive at school I have a game of football with my friends in the yard. When we come into school we go to assembly followed by English or Mathematics until we have break at 10.25am. After break we have English or Mathematics again until lunch time at 12.00pm. We choose what we want from the canteen. The choice is extensive. After our meal we play outside for a forty five minute break. In the afternoon we have options. This includes sewing,woodwork or cooking until hometime. When I get home I have some tea. Then most evenings I play football which is my favourite sport. Bedtime is about 10.00pm.
